about_the_game:
Struggling with the difficulty? Increase your gold by 500 and gems by 250 on each new level and play session! You only need to buy this DLC once to get these awesome bonuses. Upgrade Shimazu quicker than before and get through tough spots easier than before.

This DLC adds a per-level and play session increase of gems and gold dropped by enemies and for completing the levels. There is no limits to how often these rewards are given, so you can easily rack up gold and gems needed to upgrade Shimazu's abilities.
